  • java.lang.Object

  • Direct Known Subclasses:

    public abstract class Experiment
extends java.lang.Object
    Classname: Experiment.java Version: Prototype Date: March 19th, 2021 Purpose: This is the main experiment class. Backbone of the experiments for this project. Issues: Needs more tests.
